bibl.title: A List of Culinary Products and an Account on an Early Ptolemaic Ostracon (O.Giss. inv. 109+307)
bibl.note: Edition of O.Giss. inv. 109, which joins the lost O.Giss. inv. 307. Purchased between 1903 and 1912. Thebes (?), about the middle of the third century BC. - 1. The Inner Side: A List of Products. - 2. The Outer Side: An Account.
bibl.seg: 142.4 O. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 109 + 307 deperd.
Marcin Kotyl, A List of Culinary Products and an Account on an Early Ptolemaic Ostracon (O. Giss. inv. 109 + 307).

Edition of O.Giss. inv. 109, which joins the lost O.Giss. inv. 307. Purchased between 1903 and 1912. Thebes (?), about the middle of the third century BC. - 1. The Inner Side: A List of Products. - 2. The Outer Side: An Account.
